Author: CloudySideDown
Text: Go for an assessment. It is bull sh*t that we think we arent sick enough because we dont have some huge major health issue. Addicts dont get treated like that. Like you arent a real alcoholic if you only drink one bottle of wine a night and haven't been arrested. Spoiler You are how you feel. If you feel you have a problem you deserve to get help for that problem.

Author: isthised
Text: Just got out of residential treatment where I heard a million stories like yours. Go for an assessment and see what the professionals say and see what can be worked out money wise
